de.kaleidox.vban.model

Class UnfinishedByteArray

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.kaleidox.vban.model.UnfinishedByteArray
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ByteArray

    public class UnfinishedByteArray
extends java.lang.Object
implements ByteArray
    Object representing any bytearray that changes will be made to.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UnfinishedByteArray(int initSize)
      Similar to new UnfinishedByteArray(int, boolean), but defaults to a resizing buffer.
      UnfinishedByteArray(int initSize, boolean fixedSize)
      Constructor.

      • UnfinishedByteArray

        public UnfinishedByteArray(int initSize)
        Similar to new UnfinishedByteArray(int, boolean), but defaults to a resizing buffer.
        Parameters:
        initSize - The initial size of the internal buffer.

      • UnfinishedByteArray

        public UnfinishedByteArray(int initSize,
                           boolean fixedSize)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        initSize - The initial size of the internal buffer.
        fixedSize - Whether to allow the internal buffer to be resized.

    • Method Detail

      • append

        public void append(byte... bytes)
            throws java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
        Append more bytes to the end of this object.

        If you defined the buffer to be of a fixed size in the constructor, this method will throw an ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException when exceeding the current buffer size.

        Parameters:
        bytes - The byte/s to append.
        Throws:
        java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - If the buffer is of fixed size and the current buffer size is exceeded.

      • length

        public int length()
        Gets the current amount of bytes added.
        Returns:
        The current amount of bytes added.

      • finish

        public byte[] finish()
        Creates a final bytearray of all current bytes. Does not mutate.
        Returns:
        The final bytearray.

      • getBytes

        public byte[] getBytes()
        The byte-array, or the byte-array representation of this object.

        Calling this method is equal to calling finish().

        Specified by:
        getBytes in interface ByteArray
        Returns:
        A byte array that describes this object.

        public int getBufferSize()
        Gets the current buffer size.
